description: There's nothing cozier than a big slice of apple pie. But have you ever had it as a reviving drink? Now you can with Apple Pie on the Rocks! This delicious cocktail combines all the classic flavors of apple pie with a little extra kick from a delicious cinnamon liquor.The Fireball gives it a touch of heat, while the vodka adds some smoothness. And, of course, no apple pie is complete without a glass rimmed sugar/cinnamon&nbsp;garnish on your rocks glass. Best of all, the Apple Pie on the Rocks Cocktail is easy to make!
